text: Show No Mercy is the first studio album by American thrash metal band Slayer. Released on December 3, 1983, Show No Mercy was recorded in November of 1983. == Songs == The 1987 re-issue also features songs from the Haunting the Chapel EP. == Other websites == Show No Mercy on allmusic.com Category:1983 albums Category:Slayer albums
title: Show No Mercy
